entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
